command.create-table-order: CREATE TABLE t_order ( id int8 NOT NULL, order_id int4 NOT NULL, user_id int NOT NULL, t_varchar varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) )
command.create-table-order-item: CREATE TABLE t_order_item ( item_id int8 NOT NULL, order_id int4 NOT NULL, user_id int8 NOT NULL, status varchar(50), PRIMARY KEY (item_id) )
command.full-insert-order: INSERT INTO t_order(id, order_id, user_id, t_varchar) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
command.insert-order: INSERT INTO t_order ( id, order_id, user_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
command.update-order-by-id: UPDATE t_order SET t_varchar = ? WHERE id = ?
command.update-order-item-by-id: UPDATE t_order_item SET status = ? WHERE item_id = ?
